text: Ferekalsi Debesay Abrha (born 10 June 1986 in Tsazega) is an Eritrean who rode most recently for . His brother Mekseb is also a cyclist. ==Palmares== ;2009 :Prologue & 4th stage Tour d'Egypt ;2010 :1st Africa Team Time Trial Championships :5th & 9th stages Tour of Rwanda ;2011 :1st 20px National Road Race Championships :1st Africa Team Time Trial Championships ;2012 :1st Africa Team Time Trial Championships ;2014 :4th stage La Tropicale Amissa Bongo ==References== Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Eritrean male cyclists
title: Ferekalsi Debesay
